description: Too much, too fast, too heavy. Let's break it down together.

art.title: Chaos to Order Art
art.instruction: Draw overwhelming chaos on one side, organized simplicity on the other.
art.affirmation: I transform chaos into manageable order

art.title: One Thing Focus Art
art.instruction: Draw or paint focusing on just one simple, beautiful thing - a single flower, stone, or shape.
art.affirmation: I focus on one thing at a time and find peace in simplicity

art.title: Overwhelm Wave Art
art.instruction: Draw overwhelm as a huge wave, then yourself surfing it with skill and balance.
art.affirmation: I surf overwhelm's waves with skill and return to calm waters

breathwork.title: Overwhelm Slow Breathing
breathwork.instruction: Breathe very slowly - inhale 6, exhale 8. Counter overwhelm's frantic pace.
breathwork.affirmation: I slow my breath and return to my natural, peaceful rhythm

breathwork.title: One Breath at a Time
breathwork.instruction: Focus only on the current breath. When mind wanders to overwhelm, return to this breath.
breathwork.affirmation: I handle life one breath at a time

somatic.title: Overwhelm Boundary Creation
somatic.instruction: Use arms to create protective boundary around yourself. This space is manageable.
somatic.affirmation: I create manageable boundaries around my energy and attention

somatic.title: Grounding for Overwhelm
somatic.instruction: Feel feet firmly planted, send overwhelming energy down into earth.
somatic.affirmation: I ground overwhelm and let the earth hold what's too much

cbt.title: Overwhelm Task Sorting
cbt.instruction: List everything overwhelming you. Sort into: urgent/important, can delegate, can eliminate.
cbt.affirmation: I organize overwhelm into manageable, prioritized steps

rebt.title: Handle Everything Demand
rebt.instruction: Challenge 'I must handle everything perfectly and immediately.' Practice pacing and priorities.
rebt.affirmation: I handle what I can, when I can, and that is enough

neural.title: Calm Focus Installation
neural.instruction: Visualize handling overwhelm with calm focus, one step at a time.
neural.affirmation: I naturally focus calmly on one thing at a time

journaling.title: Overwhelm Breakdown Journal
journaling.instruction: Break overwhelming situations into smallest possible steps. Make the impossible manageable.
journaling.affirmation: I break down overwhelm into manageable steps I can handle

eft.title: Overwhelm Release Tapping
eft.instruction: Tap: 'Even though everything feels like too much, I choose to take things one step at a time.'
eft.affirmation: I handle overwhelm one peaceful step at a time

emdr.title: Calm Capability Installation
emdr.instruction: Install memories of handling difficult situations calmly through bilateral stimulation.
emdr.affirmation: I am capable of handling life's challenges with calm and wisdom

yoga.title: Child's Pose Overwhelm Rest
yoga.instruction: Rest in child's pose when overwhelmed. Let earth support you completely.
yoga.affirmation: I rest when overwhelmed and trust in earth's complete support
